column1: Data Type	Title	Description	Tables	Join conditions	SQL query

BEATAML1_0;  CMI; CPTAC; TARGET; WCDT	Clinical Data; Gene Expression	RNA-Seq Analysis	This query extracts HG38 RNA-seq gene expression data and clinical features.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].RNAseq_hg38_gdc_current	clin.submitter_id = rnaseq.case_barcode	#In this example
column2: select RNA-seq gene expression and age at diagnosis

column1: ORGANOID	Clinical Data; Gene Expression	RNA-Seq Analysis	This query extracts HG38 RNA-seq gene expression data and clinical features.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].RNAseq_hg38_gdc_current	clin.submitter_id = rnaseq.case_barcode	#In this example
column2: select RNA-seq gene expression and tumor_grade

column1: CGCI; HCMI; CTSP; TCGA	Clinical Data; Gene Expression	RNA-Seq Analysis	This query extracts HG38 RNA-seq gene expression data and clinical features.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_diagnoses_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].RNAseq_hg38_gdc_current	clin.submitter_id = rnaseq.case_barcode;  clin.case_id = clin_diag.case_id	#In this example
column4: age at diagnosis for those patients with vital status of 'Alive'

column1: CGCI; CPTAC; HCMI	Clinical Data; Somatic Mutation	Masked Somatic Mutation Analysis	This query extracts HG38 masked somatic mutation data and clinical features.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].masked_somatic_mutation_hg38_gdc_current	clin.submitter_id = somatic.case_barcode	#In this example
column2: select somatic mutation locations and variant types and some clinical information for those patients who have died

column1: TCGA	Clinical Data; Somatic Mutation	Somatic Mutation Analysis	This query extracts HG38 masked somatic mutation data and clinical features.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].somatic_mutation_hg38_gdc_current	clin.submitter_id = somatic.case_barcode	#In this example
column2: select somatic mutation locations and variant types and some clinical information for those patients who have died

column1: CCLE	Clinical Data; Somatic Mutation	Somatic Mutation Analysis	This query extracts HG19 somatic mutation data and clinical features.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].somatic_mutation_hg19_current	clin.case_barcode = somatic.cell_line_primary_name	#In this example
column2: select somatic mutation locations and variant types and some clinical information for a cell line

column1: BEATAML1.0; CGCI; CMI; CPTAC; CTSP; FM; GENIE; HCMI; MMRF; NCICCR; OHSU; ORGANOID; TARGET; TCGA; VAREPOP; WCDT	File Metadata	GDC File URLs	This query finds the GDC URLs and other file information for a program.	isb-cgc-bq.GDC_case_file_metadata.fileData_active_current; isb-cgc-bq.GDC_case_file_metadata.GDCfileID_to_GCSurl_current	active.file_gdc_id = GCSurl.file_gdc_id	#Find the GDC URLs and other file information for a progam. The URLS can be used to access the files from the GDC Google Storage Bucket.

CCLE	File Metadata	Legacy GDC File URLs	This query finds the Legacy GDC URLs and other file information for a program.	isb-cgc-bq.GDC_case_file_metadata.fileData_legacy_current; isb-cgc-bq.GDC_case_file_metadata.GDCfileID_to_GCSurl_current	legacy.file_gdc_id = GCSurl.file_gdc_id	#Find the Legacy GDC URL and other file information for a progam. The URLS can be used to access the files from the GDC Legacy Google Storage Bucket.
BEATAML1.0; CGCI; CMI; CPTAC; CTSP; FM; GENIE; HCMI; MMRF; NCICCR; OHSU; ORGANOID; TARGET; TCGA; VAREPOP; WCDT	Clinical Data
column2: File Metadata	HG38 Sample File Metadata	This query finds HG38 sample file metadata for a program.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].per_sample_file_metadata_hg38_gdc_current	clin.submitter_id = sfm.case_barcode	#Query for Sample File Metadata by program

File Metadata	HG19 Sample File Metadata	This query finds HG19 sample file metadata for CCLE.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].per_sample_file_metadata_hg19_gdc_current	clin.case_barcode = sfm.case_barcode	#Query for CCLE HG19 Sample File Metadata

File Metadata	HG19 Sample File Metadata	This query finds HG19 sample file metadata for a program.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].per_sample_file_metadata_hg19_gdc_current	clin.submitter_id = sfm.case_barcode	#Query for [PROGRAM] HG19 Sample File Metadata

Diagnosis and Treatment Information	This query returns treatment information for clinical diagnoses.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_diagnoses_gdc_current;  isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_diagnoses_treatments_gdc_current	clin.case_id = clin_diag.case_id; clin_diag.diag__diagnosis_id = clin_diag_treat.diag__diagnosis_id	#Query for clinical
column3: diagnoses and treatments by joing on three tables

Diagnosis and Treatment Information	This query returns treatment information for a clinical diagnoses.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_diagnoses_treatments_gdc_current	clin.case_id = clin_diag_treat.case_id	#Query for clinical
column4: diagnoses and treatments. Using left join
column6: even if there are no diagnoses/treatment records

column3: Diagnosis and Molecular Test Information	This query displays clinical information and follow-up records. If there are molecuar test records
column4: also display that information.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_follow_ups_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_follow_ups_molecular_tests_gdc_current	clin.case_id = clin_follow_up.case_id; clin_follow_up.follow__follow_up_id = clin_follow_molec_tests.follow__follow_up_id	#Display all clinical follow-up records. If there are molecuar test records

column2: Diagnosis and Molecular Test Information	This query displays clinical information and follow-up records. If there are molecuar test records
column3: also display that information.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_follow_ups_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_follow_ups_molecular_tests_gdc_current	clin.case_id = clin_follow_up.case_id; clin_follow_up.follow__follow_up_id = clin_follow_molec_tests.follow__follow_up_id	#Display all clinical follow-up records. If there are molecuar test records

column1: MMRF; VAREPOP	Clinical Data	Clinical and Family History Information	This query displays clinical and family history information.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_gdc_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_family_histories_gdc_current	clin.case_id = clin_fam_hist.case_id	SELECT clin.submitter_id

CCLE	Clinical Data; Biospecimen	Clinical and Biospecimen Data	This query displays CCLE clinical and biospecimen records.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].biospecimen_current	clin.case_barcode = biospec.case_barcode	#Retrieve all CCLE clinical cases. Using the LEFT JOIN
column2: if biospecimen records exist for them

column1: CCLE	Clinical Data	Counting Cases per Primary Site	This query counts the number of cases per primary site.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_current		#Get a count of how many cases per primary site

CCLE	Clinical Data; Biospecimen	Counting Samples per Case	This query finds all cases having more than one sample.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].biospecimen_current	clin.case_barcode = biospec.case_barcode	#Find all cases having more than one sample

CCLE	Clinical Data; Gene Expression	CCLE RMA Analysis	This query finds Robust Multi-array Average (RMA) expression data for cell lines and genes.	isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].clinical_current; isb-cgc-bq.[PROGRAM].RMA_expression_hg19_current	clin.case_barcode = RMA.cell_line_primary_name	#Retrieve RMA expression. Use a FULL JOIN because there are cell lines which are in the RMA table and
#not in the clinical table and vice-versa.
